title: Hour 1: NFL Judge and Jury
description:
Katie George, Domonique Foxworth and Louis Riddick unpack the NFL's decision to appeal Deshaun Watson's six game suspension. Is Dak Prescott the QB with the most to prove? And are NFL players and owners held to the same standard?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Will the NFL seek a longer suspension for Watson?
